title: Simplify Yes tap sequence and preload images for instant transitions

requirements.summary: Remove the third post-"Yes" image step so the sequence is: WA0002 image → WA0000 image → final love message text, and keep looping + keyboard accessibility.
acceptanceCriteria: After tapping "Yes", the user sees IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg first.
On tap, the next step shows IMG-20260210-WA0000.jpg.
On tap, the next step shows the final love message text (no third image is shown anywhere in the sequence).
On tap of the final message step, the sequence loops back to IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg and can repeat indefinitely.
Keyboard accessibility remains functional (Enter/Space advances; final step loops).

file_operations.description: Update the step logic and rendering to remove the IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg step, leaving only two image steps (Step 1: /assets/IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg, Step 2: /assets/IMG-20260210-WA0000.jpg) followed by the existing final love message text as the last step; keep looping behavior so tapping the final message returns to Step 1. Ensure keyboard accessibility works for the sequence (Enter/Space advances and loops on the final step), e.g., by making each step focusable and handling keydown consistently.

requirements.summary: Preload the two remaining sequence images to make tap transitions feel instant (no visible loading delay).
acceptanceCriteria: On a normal iPad Chrome connection, tapping to advance between steps does not show a blank/loading state while the next image downloads.
Both images are requested early (e.g., during/after entering the success view) so the next step displays immediately on tap.
No new backend endpoints or network calls are introduced for image delivery (images remain static frontend assets).

file_operations.description: Add client-side preloading for /assets/IMG-20260210-WA0002.jpg and /assets/IMG-20260210-WA0000.jpg (e.g., via an effect on component mount that creates Image objects or equivalent) so both images are requested as soon as the post-"Yes" view is entered and transitions between steps show immediately without a blank/loading state.

requirements.summary: Remove the unused third image asset (IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg) from public assets (if present) and eliminate any remaining code references.
acceptanceCriteria: There are no code references to /assets/IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg.
If IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg exists under the frontend public assets, it is removed from the project so it is no longer shipped.

file_operations.description: Remove the unused third sequence image asset from the shipped frontend public assets if it exists.
Remove any remaining references to /assets/IMG-20260210-WA0001.jpg in the post-"Yes" tap sequence so the third image is not used anywhere.
